PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: CLAUDIO, a young lord of Florence.
BENEDICK, a young lord of Padua.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Before LEONATO'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter LEONATO, HERO, and BEATRICE, with a
Messenger

Enter DON PEDRO, DON JOHN, CLAUDIO, BENEDICK,
and BALTHASAR
Exeunt all except BENEDICK and CLAUDIO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A room in LEONATO's house.
SCENE I. A hall in LEONATO'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LEONATO, ANTONIO, HERO, BEATRICE, and others

Enter DON PEDRO, CLAUDIO, BENEDICK, BALTHASAR,
DON JOHN, BORACHIO, MARGARET, URSULA and others, masked

Dance. Then exeunt all except DON JOHN, BORACHIO,
and CLAUDIO
Enter CLAUDIO, BEATRICE , HERO, and LEONATO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. LEONATO'S orchard.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DON PEDRO, CLAUDIO, and LEONATO
Exeunt DON PEDRO, CLAUDIO, and LEONATO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A room in LEONATO'S house
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DON PEDRO, CLAUDIO, BENEDICK, and LEONATO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DOGBERRY and VERGES with the Watch

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Another room in LEONATO'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LEONATO, with DOGBERRY and VERGES

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A church.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DON PEDRO, DON JOHN, LEONATO, FRIAR FRANCIS,
CLAUDIO, BENEDICK, HERO, BEATRICE, and Attendants
Exeunt DON PEDRO, DON JOHN, and CLAUDIO
Exeunt all but BENEDICK and BEATRICE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A prison.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DOGBERRY, VERGES, and Sexton, in gowns; and
the Watch, with CONRADE and BORACHIO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Before LEONATO'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DOGBERRY, VERGES, and the Watch, with CONRADE
and BORACHIO
Re-enter LEONATO and ANTONIO, with the Sexton

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A church.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DON PEDRO, CLAUDIO, and three or four
with tapers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. A room in LEONATO'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter LEONATO, ANTONIO, BENEDICK, BEATRICE,
MARGARET, URSULA, FRIAR FRANCIS, and HERO

Enter DON PEDRO and CLAUDIO, and two or
three others

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLAUDIO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Re-enter ANTONIO, with the Ladies masked
